column3: Traffic;Banteay Meanchey: Banteay Meanchey------ traffic police arrested teenagers who posted images of them doing stunts on motorbikes and posted them on social media.------Police say these actions are affecting public order safety on the streets
column4: and called the boys guardians to come and sign contracts agreeing not to do wheelies and such forth in the future.------After some education in road safety
column5: the boys were released with a stern warning.
